properties.entry: SELECT PLACE_NO , PLACE_TITLE , PLACE_CONTENT , MAKE_DATE , VIEW_COUNT , STAR_POINT , HASHTAG_NAME FROM TB_PLACE JOIN TB_HASHTAG USING (PLACE_NO) WHERE WRITER = ? AND STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY MAKE_DATE DESC

INSERT INTO TB_PLACE( PLACE_NO ,PLACE_TITLE ,CATEGORY_NO ,WRITER ,LOCATION_NO ,MAKE_DATE ,STATUS ,PHONE ,ADDRESS ,PLACE_CONTENT ,START_TIME ,END_TIME ,STAR_POINT ,PLACE_URL ,VIEW_COUNT ,USE_TIME ,USE_PRICE ,BEST_STATUS ) VALUES ( 'PL'||SEQ_PNO.NEXTVAL ,? --PLACE_TITLE ,? --CATEGORY_NO ,? -- WRITER ,? --LOCATION_NO ,SYSDATE ,DEFAULT ,? --PHONE ,? -- ADDRESS ,? --PLACE_CONTENT ,? --START_TIME ,? -- END_TIME ,? --STAR_POINT ,? --PLACE_URL ,DEFAULT --VIEW_COUNT ,? --USE_TIME ,? --USE_PRICE ,DEFAULT )

INSERT INTO TB_FILE ( FILE_NO ,ORIGIN_NAME ,CHANGE_NAME ,FILE_PATH ,UPLOAD_DATE ,REF_NO ,STATUS ,FILE_LEVEL ) VALUES ( SEQ_FILE.NEXTVAL ,? --ORIGIN_NAME ,? --CHANGE_NAME ,? --FILE_PATH , SYSDATE ,'PL'||SEQ_PNO.CURRVAL ,DEFAULT ,? --FILE_LEVEL )

SELECT PLACE_NO ,PLACE_TITLE ,CATEGORY_NO ,WRITER ,LOCATION_NO ,MAKE_DATE ,P.STATUS ,PHONE ,ADDRESS ,PLACE_CONTENT ,START_TIME ,END_TIME ,STAR_POINT ,PLACE_URL ,VIEW_COUNT ,USE_TIME ,USE_PRICE ,BEST_STATUS ,FILE_PATH || '/' ||CHANGE_NAME "TITLEIMG" FROM TB_PLACE P JOIN TB_FILE F ON ( REF_NO = PLACE_NO ) WHERE LOCATION_NO = ? AND FILE_LEVEL = 1 AND P.STATUS = 'Y'
select FILE_NO ,ORIGIN_NAME ,FILE_PATH || '/' ||CHANGE_NAME "IMG" FROM TB_FILE WHERE REF_NO = ? AND FILE_LEVEL = 2
UPDATE TB_PLACE SET LIKECOUNT = LIKECOUNT + 1 WHERE PLACE_NO = ?
